text: is a Japanese word. In English, it means few years. It can have any of the these meanings: *Shōnen, a normal boy. A student in primary school up to Middle School *Shōnen (magazine), a manga magazine published by Koubunsha *Weekly Shōnen Magazine, a manga magazine published by Kodansha *Shounen (media), media whose audience is boys under 18-years-old
title: Shōnen
